artist: Artist: Emilio Vedova; Publisher: La Biennale de Venezià, 1974
creditline: Acquired through the Minnesota Museum Property Act
description: Issue 3 of 5 of a newspaper published during the 1974 Biennale di Venezia with a poster insert by Emilio Vedova; newspaper type in black and orange inks; poster is white with thick black lines, slashes, and circles in black throughout; NERUDA ALLENDE is written in large black letters on the left bottom border and Vedova 73 in lower right corner
medium: Offset lithography and letterpress in black and orange
title: Issue 3 of Libertà al Cile: Liberstad para Chile, La Biennale di Venezià, 1974
